issues.title: Gun Control
issues.description: Strong advocate for comprehensive gun control legislation, including universal background checks and assault weapons ban

issues.title: Healthcare Reform
issues.description: Supports expanding the Affordable Care Act, increasing healthcare access, and lowering prescription drug prices

issues.title: Climate Change
issues.description: Advocates for aggressive climate action, supports Green New Deal principles, and investment in renewable energy infrastructure

issues.title: Racial Justice
issues.description: Supports police reform, addressing systemic racism, and promoting economic opportunities for minority communities

issues.title: Education Funding
issues.description: Advocates for increased federal education funding, student debt relief, and expanded access to higher education

issues.title: Economic Equity
issues.description: Supports raising minimum wage, strengthening labor protections, and promoting small business development

issues.title: Immigration Reform
issues.description: Supports comprehensive immigration reform, path to citizenship, and protecting DACA recipients
